review_data.title: Tasty Indian food with accommodating staff!

review_data.title: Best Indian restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: I discovered this gem thanks to an Indian friend, who is very selective about Indian food, and this place has become a favorite restaurant for me and my family. I highly recommend the Butter Chicken if you like mildly spicy Indian food and the Badami...More

review_data.title: Best Naan in town!
review_data.content: Best naan in zurich! The food is as close as it gets to the indian cuisine, and the service is on point and friendly! Must try the starters

review_data.title: Kommen wieder!
review_data.content: Bedienung super freundlich und zuvorkommend. Das Essen ebenso ausgezeichnet wie der Service. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder!

review_data.title: Food
review_data.content: The food was great and the service was very good and the rolls and curries are excellent and it was a good experience. And finally there is a good restaurant in Zurich that serves authentic Indian food

review_data.title: Great!
review_data.content: Very good,authentic indian food. They have excellent dishes over lunch, as well as for dinner. I can highly recommend it!

review_data.title: Tests That Good Indian restaurant should pass

review_data.title: Delicious Dinner at Urban Spice
review_data.content: Do not miss out to have dinner at Urban Spice. The Lunch ist very good but you have to try a la carte for dinner! It's even better and more various than lunch... The taste is top notch and one of my favs in that...More

review_data.title: Amazing food amazing service!
review_data.content: Restaurant is amazing with delicious food! Garlic naan and butter chicken were so amazing! Best service by Jamila, she was super sweet and so helpful! Will definitely come back!!

review_data.title: Nice food with Indian taste
review_data.content: Garlic naan and paneer Tikka masala were really nice and cooked properly spicy Indian style. Jamila is the lady who was very much co-operative and even offered mango lasso from her side. This place is a little jam in otherwise very quiet neighborhood of Zurich....More

review_data.title: Nice Indian food
review_data.content: Very good food. Taste quite near to authentic Indian flavours. Kheema Pav was good, Mango Spritz cocktail fantastic.

review_data.title: wonderful lunch
review_data.content: we had a wonderful lunch. the food was authentic and very tasty. prices are reasonable especially for lunch. very friendly staff. it's a modern and beautiful place to go. we recommend!

review_data.title: Super good
review_data.content: I am coming to eat here at least one time per week since i have discovered. Good price, super nice people and good taste.

review_data.title: Very blant but nice setting and fast service
review_data.content: The vegetarian is very blant and very basic choices (And I have been eating Indian food in Europe a lot). But if you dont mind, the service is fast, the location lovely.
